name: EMPTY CHARTY CARTOGRAPHY PARTY 2022 GOTY EDITION
name_original: EMPTY CHARTY CARTOGRAPHY PARTY 2022 GOTY EDITION
description:
GO LEFT

please try not to hit docks, you'll get stuck.  (our bad) if you do get stuck, wait for your supplies to run out

-Head west (left) to find the new world!

-Gain favor by exploring the map and killing pirates

-Spend favor to buy permanent upgrades

-Gain gold by killing pirates, spend gold to buy temporary upgrades

-If your supplies run out, your run is over!

-Regenerate supplies by slamming your boat into a port island (has houses on it)

-currently you can only use ports once per game, not per run... oops

-Reveal a large section of map by slamming your boat into a lighthouse island!

-W A S to drive, left click to shoot

- Win by heading far enough west (LEFT)

Roguelike

- map is procedurally generated, but stays between runs, so you can find a path

- dying resets your run, except permanent upgrades

Empty

- A whole empty map is yours to explore!
